meanings.sent1: She kept reexplaining the math problem until everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: I will reexplain the instructions to make sure you get it.
meanings.sent3: The teacher was reexplaining so much that even the walls started to understand.
meanings.sent4: His patience was like reexplaining a complicated concept to a toddler.
meanings.sent5: The concept became clear after reexplaining it multiple times.

meanings.sent1: He was reexplaining the rules of the game to avoid any confusion.
meanings.sent2: The scientist reexplained the theory with new examples.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started reexplaining the joke to the other birds in the cage.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like reexplaining a map to someone lost in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The professor's lecture was like reexplaining a complex idea in simple terms.
